sentences.sentence: I was in a wheelchair; I didn't look like a looter.
sentences.translation: 我坐在轮椅，完全不像抢劫者。

sentences.sentence: One looter was killed when the 2 sides exchanged fire.
sentences.translation: 双方发生交火，一名哄抢者被击毙。

sentences.sentence: So the words of an 18-year-old looter should come as no surprise.
sentences.translation: 所以一位18岁的打劫者所说的就一点儿也不惊讶了。
